EmailTemplate.name: Incomplete Enrolment Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Incomplete Enrolment Email - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your Course Enrolment form and your Acceptance form. ( What ever forms we receive should be mentioned here)
To assist us with the processing of your Enrolment, MGE requires the forms listed below and additional information in order to finalise your enrolment. Could you please send these original documents in the mail (post) to:
Monash Graduate Education Chancellory Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University VIC 3800, Australia
Documentation required to complete your enrolment:
Ethics and Intellectual Property forms - signed both by yourself and your supervisor RTS (Research Training Scheme) Form - signed by yourself Original certified copies of your Academic Transcripts - (Swinburne Uni, University of Tasmania) Original Certified copy of your passport/Birth certificate/citizenship Original of name/change documents - e.g: marriage/divorce certificate if applicable
Should you have any concerns regarding this matter, you are welcome to contact me.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listeningâ€¦.your feedback helps us improve
Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
